welcome: Welcome, {name}! I am an AI image generation bot. What would you like to do?
help:
Here are the available commands:
/img - Start image generation
/profile - View your profile and credits
/referral - Get your referral link
/lang - Change language
profile:
👤 *Your Profile*

*Credits*
▸ Total: *{total_credits}* 💵
▸ Paid: `{paid_credits}`
▸ Free: `{free_credits}`

*Want to earn extra credits? Invite friends and get bonuses!*

_Next free credits in: {reset_time}_
referral_message: Share this link with your friends! You'll get 5 💵.
insufficient_credits: You don't have enough credits for this model. Required: {required} 💵, You have: {balance} 💵.
choose_model: ⚙️ Current Settings - Ratio: {aspect_ratio} - Images: {num_images} Please choose an AI model to generate your image:
generating: ⏳ Generating your image... This might take a moment.
generation_failed: ❌ Generation failed. Please try again later.
flow_cancelled: ✅ Operation cancelled. You can start a new command.
permission_denied: ❌ You do not have permission to use this command.
broadcast_started: ⏳ Starting broadcast to {user_count} users... You will be notified upon completion.
broadcast_finished: ✅ Broadcast finished. Sent to {sent_count} of {total_count} users.
enter_prompt_with_image_option:
{model_name}
{model_description}
This model supports image references. Please send your image with the prompt in the caption, or just send a text prompt.
settings_menu:
⚙️ *Settings*

Here you can configure your generation preferences. Your current settings are:

- *Aspect Ratio*: `{aspect_ratio}`
- *Number of Images*: `{num_images}`
select_aspect_ratio: Please select your desired aspect ratio:
select_num_images: Please select how many images to generate at once:
multiple_images_warning: ⚠️ You are about to generate {num_images} images. Total cost: {total_cost} 💵
referral_bonus_notification:
🎉 *Referral Bonus!* 🎉

You have received *5 💵* from a friend you invited. Thank you for helping our community grow!
referral_progress_text: Invite {remaining} more friends to get a bonus!
raw_file_prompt: Do you want the original, uncompressed files?
raw_files_not_found: Sorry, the links for these files have expired or are no longer available.
